Forge 18.2 for STU3 is now available for download from https://fire.ly/forge/.
Release 18.2 represents a minor update with stability and feature improvements.

Change log: https://simplifier.net/ui/OrganizationNews/Show?id=44

If you find a new issue or would like to submit a feature request, please contact us at forge@fire.ly.

Happy profiling!
@Michel Rutten Hi,I open a file in forge tool and i made some changes.While i was saving my file it cant be saved or closed.please tell me how to resolve it.Thank You

Same issue, already reported :-). As temporary workaroud If you use "save as" and you overwrite the file you are sure to save the latest version, but the "star" icon that says that the file has been changed remain active....
I am also getting same isssue in forge tool while saving my profile.

I had also some problems with existing extensions , and remving and readding exactly the same extensions the warning message disappeared from the profile....But I hope there is some more cleaver way to resolve the problem :-)
Hi all, thank you for reporting the issue, we are investigating.

Looks like the Save issue is related to the configuration option "Save snapshot component".
If enabled, the star icon does not disappear after save.
So as a workaround, you can temporarily toggle this setting.
have you not already published the fix ?
This afternoon I don't experence this issue anymore ...
@Giorgio Cangioli No, we have identified the cause of the issue and are now working on a fix. I expect to publish an update tomorrow.
OK, the only explanation is that I disabled that option involontary when i used it ..... Thanks for fixing it.
